name: @bitwarden/desktop
description: A secure and free password manager for all of your devices.
author: Bitwarden Inc. <hello@bitwarden.com> (https://bitwarden.com)

scripts.sub:pull: git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.sub:commit: npm run sub:pull && git commit -am "update submodule"
scripts.build: concurrently -n Main,Rend -c yellow,cyan "npm run build:main" "npm run build:renderer"
scripts.build:dev: concurrently -n Main,Rend -c yellow,cyan "npm run build:main:dev" "npm run build:renderer:dev"
scripts.electron: npm run build:main:dev && concurrently -k -n Main,Rend -c yellow,cyan "electron --inspect=5858 ./build --watch" "npm run build:renderer:watch"
scripts.electron:ignore: npm run build:main:dev && concurrently -k -n Main,Rend -c yellow,cyan "electron --inspect=5858 --ignore-certificate-errors ./build --watch" "npm run build:renderer:watch"
scripts.pack:mac:mas: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --mac mas --universal -p never
scripts.pack:mac:masdev: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --mac mas-dev --universal -p never
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p never -c.win.certificateSubjectName="8bit Solutions LLC"
scripts.dist:dir: npm run build && npm run pack:dir
scripts.dist:lin: npm run build && npm run pack:lin
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && npm run pack:mac
scripts.dist:mac:mas: npm run build && npm run pack:mac:mas
scripts.dist:mac:masdev: npm run build && npm run pack:mac:masdev
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && npm run pack:win
scripts.dist:win:ci: npm run build && npm run pack:win:ci
scripts.publish:lin: npm run build && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --linux --x64 -p always
scripts.publish:mac: npm run build && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --mac -p always
scripts.publish:mac:mas: npm run dist:mac:mas && npm run upload:mas
scripts.publish:win: npm run build && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p always -c.win.certificateSubjectName="8bit Solutions LLC"
scripts.publish:win:dev: npm run build && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p always
